value.title: Talking DATA end to end with Buck Woody
value.excerpt: Where does your data come from? What do you need to consider with your data? Buck Woody explored the world of data and how services like Azure Synapse Analytics and Power BI can help you in your journey!  Connect with Buck: https://twitter.com/BuckWoodyMSFT https://www.linkedin.com/in/buckwoody/  📢

value.title: The Power BI Premium video you need to watch… probably (Oct 2021)
value.excerpt: There has been a lot of recent news about Power BI Premium. Adam looks at what Gen2 is all about along with timelines to keep in mind. A MUST watch... probably.  What is Power BI Premium Gen2: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-premium-gen2-what-is  Power BI Premium Gen2 capacity load

value.title: The Tale of Two Caches
value.excerpt: Want to optimize performance in Power BI? Of course, you do! In order to do that, you need to understand the two caches that are at play and how they affect your optimization efforts. Marco Russo helps explain!  DAX Studio 3 https://daxstudio.org  Connect with SQLBI: Website: https://sqlbi.com YouTube:

value.title: Tracing Power BI with Fiddler
value.excerpt: I look at how you can use Fiddler to trace what is happening between your client machine and the Power BI Service.  This looks at the API's we use and what is returned. value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it’s Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)
